title: Language Project-Based Education for Enhancing Higher-Order Thinking Skills in Adult Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary language proficiency and foundational job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in smartphone-centric limited technological environments, where learners assume manager/leader roles to solve real-world tasks

learning_goals: Learners can apply critical thinking strategies to analyze problems and propose solutions in real-world work scenarios.
Learners can complete language-based tasks (such as report writing and presentations) by utilizing creative thinking techniques during the project process.
Learners can evaluate and improve their own thinking processes through peer feedback and reflective thinking.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
